spells.name: Phantom Steed
spells.description: Creates the illusion of a magnificent horse that can actually carry a rider. The steed appears real to all senses but cannot truly interact with the world.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create moving image), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite

spells.description: Creates the illusion of a magnificent palace complete with furnishings and decorations. The illusion is convincing to all senses.

spells.name: Destroy the Phantom Image
spells.description: This spell destroys a single illusion or magical image, causing it to vanish instantly. It can dispel visual phantasms, dismiss conjured images, and reveal what lies behind false appearances. The spell only affects magical illusions, not natural phenomena.

spells.name: Silence the Echoing Voice
spells.description: This spell destroys all sound coming from a specific source, creating perfect silence around the target. The affected person or object makes no noise whatsoever - footsteps, speech, armor clanking, or any other sounds are completely eliminated.

spells.name: Banish the False Vision
spells.description: This spell destroys all illusions and false images within a large area, revealing the truth beneath magical deceptions. It can unmask disguised individuals, dispel complex phantasms, and reveal hidden objects concealed by illusion magic.

spells.name: Destroy the Scrying Eye
spells.description: This defensive spell destroys any magical sensors or scrying attempts targeting the area around the caster. Invisible eyes, arcane sensors, and other remote viewing magic are instantly dispelled, providing protection from magical surveillance.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (destroy scrying magic), +0 Personal, +1 Diameter, +2 Room

spells.name: Blind the Keen Observer
spells.description: This spell destroys a person's ability to see by interfering with the visual images reaching their eyes. The target becomes effectively blind for the duration, though their eyes remain physically unharmed. The blindness is caused by the destruction of visual species.

spells.name: Shatter the Mirror's Truth
spells.description: This spell destroys reflections in mirrors, water, or other reflective surfaces. The target appears to cast no reflection at all, creating an eerie and unsettling effect. This can be used to hide one's presence or create supernatural fear.

spells.name: Destroy the Painted Portrait
spells.description: This spell erases images from paintings, drawings, tapestries, or other artistic works. The image simply fades away, leaving blank canvas or parchment. This can be used to destroy evidence, remove magical symbols, or vandalize artwork.

spells.name: Banish the Haunting Specter
spells.description: This spell destroys ghostly apparitions and spectral images, whether they are actual spirits or magical phantasms. The spell disrupts the visual and auditory components that make spirits visible and audible to the living.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy supernatural images), +2 Voice, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Deafen the Listening Ear
spells.description: This spell destroys a person's ability to hear by eliminating all auditory species reaching their ears. The target becomes completely deaf for the duration, unable to hear speech, music, warning sounds, or any other audio. Their ears remain physically undamaged.

spells.name: Void of Absolute Darkness
spells.description: This powerful spell creates an area of absolute darkness by destroying all light and visual species within the target area. No form of light, magical or mundane, can penetrate this darkness. Even creatures with supernatural vision find themselves blind within the void.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy all light), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +3 Structure

spells.name: Erase the Arcane Symbol
spells.description: This spell specifically destroys magical symbols, sigils, and mystical markings by eliminating their visual species. It can erase magical wards, remove enchanted tattoos, or destroy powerful symbols of power. The underlying magic may remain but becomes invisible and harder to target.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (destroy magical images), +1 Touch, +1 Vim requisite

spells.name: Wizard's Sidestep
spells.description: This spell displaces the caster's visual image by a few feet in any direction, making attacks miss their true location. The caster appears to be standing slightly to the side of where they actually are, providing protection against targeted attacks.

spells.name: Veil of Invisibility
spells.description: This spell bends light around the target, making them completely invisible to normal sight. The person can move freely while remaining unseen, though they may still be detected by other senses or magical means of detection.

spells.name: Eyes of the Eagle
spells.description: This spell enhances the caster's vision by controlling how visual species reach their eyes. They can see clearly at great distances, discern fine details, and notice things that would normally be too small or far away to observe.

spells.name: Illusion of the Perfect Double
spells.description: This spell creates a perfect visual and auditory duplicate of any person. The illusion can move independently, speak, and perform actions as directed by the caster. The double appears completely real to all normal senses.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create complex moving illusion), +2 Voice, +2 Sun

spells.name: Cloak of Shifting Hues
spells.description: This spell allows the target to control their appearance by shifting colors and patterns on their clothing and skin. They can blend with surroundings like a chameleon, create striking visual displays, or simply change their apparent coloration at will.

spells.name: Mirror's Faithful Reflection
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to view any location by controlling reflective surfaces like mirrors, still water, or polished metal. The reflection shows the desired location as if the caster were looking through a window, providing remote viewing capabilities.

spells.name: Phantasmal Maze of Confusion
spells.description: This spell creates a complex visual illusion that makes an area appear to be a confusing maze. Walls seem to shift, passages appear and disappear, and navigation becomes nearly impossible. Those trapped within become hopelessly lost.

spells.name: Silence the Betraying Echo
spells.description: This spell controls sound around the target, eliminating all noise they make while moving. Footsteps, armor clanking, weapon draws, and even breathing become completely silent, allowing for perfect stealth movement.

spells.name: Theatre of Mind's Eye
spells.description: This powerful spell creates elaborate visual and auditory illusions that can affect multiple people simultaneously. The caster can stage complex scenes, recreate historical events, or create immersive theatrical performances that seem completely real to all observers.

spells.name: Bend the Light's Path
spells.description: This spell controls the path of light through an area, creating optical effects like making areas appear brighter or darker, bending light around corners to see hidden areas, or focusing light into beams for illumination or signaling.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (control light paths), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Room

spells.name: Voices of the Distant Caller
spells.description: This spell allows two-way conversation across any distance by controlling sound species. The caster can speak with anyone they have an Arcane Connection to, and both parties can hear each other clearly as if standing face to face.
